There were no other sightings in Doraville on or around November 4th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a triangle object move to my west. it was white, with green light around it, under it was a whit, blue, and red light. it move about 35 miles per hr. it was the size of a toyoto cambry. it was amazing. it lasted for a good 2 minutes.
Summary: saw a triangle object-revolve as it was moving. white,green aroung it, with white, green, and red lights under it.
